text: aur beshak unamen se ek giroh[1] aisa hai, jo apanee zabaanon ko kitaab padhate samay marodate hain, taaki tum use pustak mein se samajho, jabaki vah pustak mein se nahin hai aur kahate hain ki vah allaah ke paas se hai, jabaki vah allaah ke paas se nahin hai aur allaah par jaanate hue jhooth bolate hain
